description:
Hemispheres combine to bring you a truly special chocolate bar. Loaded with roasted Californian almonds, this bar of New Zealand’s finest 72% dark chocolate is a rich, crunchy treat to be savoured.

  • Ingredients: dark chocolate [cocoa solids 62% (cocoa mass & pure cocoa butter), sugar, emulsifier (soy lecithin), vanilla flavour]; roasted almonds
  • Allergens, may contain: milk, peanuts, other tree nuts and gluten
  • A family legacy, Whittaker’s is New Zealand’s finest chocolate and has been since 1896
  • Based on rich Ghanian cocoa pods that are sun-dried to perfection before processing in small batches in Porirua New Zealand
  • Rainforest alliance certified
name: Whittaker's Dark Almond Chocolate
